column5: I am lookin for a fly in spot for a 3-4 day trip with my buddy and our  14 year old sons. Willing to drive 6 hours from London to a starting point(Sudbury,Temagemi) . We are looking for pike and walleye. Thanks for any help.
Lakeland Airways has some fair back lakes cabins.  http://www.lakelandthreebuoys.com/
Halley's camps has walleye and pike....but its alot more than 6 hours out of London

If you drive through the states you can be up around the Sault in 6 and wawa in around 7-8hrs and this opens up a pile of options.  http://www.walleyeheaven.com/wawa-walleye-fishing.htm  http://www.ontariowilderness.com/ontario-fly-in-walleye.php
no no mines better LOL jk....but heres the link   http://www.halleyscamps.com/
